alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued November 18 at 12:57PM PST until November 19 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph tonight, becoming northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph Sunday. Waves 2 to 3 feet, except up to 4 feet at times late tonight. * WHERE...Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
